# privx_local_user (Resource)

PrivX local user

## Example Usage

```terraform
variable "initial_password" {
  type      = string
  sensitive = true
}

resource "privx_local_user" "example" {
  username  = "example-user"
  full_name = "Terraform provider Test User"
  job_title = "worker"
  email     = "example-user@example.com"

  password                  = var.initial_password
  password_change_required  = true
  tags                      = ["team-a", "oncall"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `full_name` (String) Full name of the user
- `username` (String)

### Optional

- `company` (String) Company of the user
- `department` (String) Department of the user
- `email` (String)
- `first_name` (String)
- `job_title` (String)
- `last_name` (String)
- `locale` (String) Locale of the user
- `password` (String, Sensitive) Initial password (write-only)
- `password_change_required` (Boolean) Whether the user must change their password at next login
- `tags` (List of String)
- `telephone` (String) Phone number of the user
- `unix_account` (String) Unix account name
- `windows_account` (String) Windows account name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
